FAQ

What are the requirements to apply?

To apply for a loan with ATITOD Services, you will need to provide a valid form of identification, your Bank Verification Number (BVN), and proof of income. We consider all profiles and are committed to transparent, fair lending practices across Nigeria. Our loan solutions are designed to meet diverse financial needs.

How fast can I get the money?

For loan applicants in Nigeria, ATITOD Services can disburse funds in as little as 24 hours after approval. Our fast loan process ensures you get the financial assistance you need quickly and efficiently.

Is collateral required?

Collateral requirements depend on the loan amount and type. Many of our personal loans are unsecured, but business loans for larger amounts may require collateral.
